CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 1, 1955, pg. 9, reads: "Political Christmas Cheer - Officer William Reed watches as Lonnie Stovall, committeeman of the Second District of the Fifth Ward, and Curtis (Chocolate) Williams, secretary of the ward committee, committeeman of the Sixth District of the Fifth Ward, and rumored candidate for alderman, distributes more than 100 baskets of food and toys to Hill District families.  Included were two dozen baby dolls, clothes, shoes and candy donated by Dave Roberts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Police officer William Reed pointing to Lonnie Stovall and Curtis Williams, loading back of station wagon with dolls and food baskets, near intersection of Herron Avenue and Milwaukee Street, with Christmas tree and Milron Pharmacy in background, Hill District
